name: Bomb Bomb!
description:
Hold to adjust the direction in which you intend to throw the Bomb.
Take advantage of any object that can help the Bomb bounce purposely.


You only have 8 seconds before your Bomb goes off, so pay attention and choose the timing wisely if you don't want to kill yourself or miss the targets (The red ones).


Be careful not to kill the white people or you will fail.

It’s perfect if you can kill all targets with just 1 Bomb, but what if you can’t? Don't worry, the next Bomb will show up.


Now, grab the bombs and blow them up.
